s.text: Particularly true for household sector-E-mail, Electronic bill paying, FAX, long-distance call
Economic and econometric theory underlying analysis available in technical paper by same title that can be downloaded from http://www-leland.stanford.edu/~wolak

There is uncertainty associated with all of the numbers presented in this paper due to sampling error and estimation error in econometric estimation procedure used to recover household-level demand functions
Two surveys administered to different samples of households: (1) Quarterly Interview Survey and (2) Diary Survey
This event appears to signal a leveling-off or decline in household-level use of USPS postal delivery services
